In England, in the seven days to 16 July, there were 287,589 new confirmed cases (510.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 July, there were 192,827 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% (94,762 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 July is 4,851,264 (8,618.8 cases per 100,000 population).
